Influence.definition: the act or power of producing an effect without any apparent exertion of force or direct exercise of command b
Influence.origin: [was arrested for driving under the influence ]

1 a.definition: the act or power of producing an effect without any apparent exertion of force or direct exercise of command

sub_terms.b: corrupt interference with authority for personal gain

2.definition: the power or capacity of causing an effect in indirect or intangible ways
